meanings.sent1: I love to eat fresh veggies from the garden.
meanings.sent2: My mom always cooks veggies with our meals.
meanings.sent3: Why did the tomato blush? Because it saw the veggies dressing!
meanings.sent4: The veggies in the salad added a burst of color to the plate.
meanings.sent5: The farmer's market had a wide variety of veggies on display.

meanings.sent1: My friend is a dedicated veggie and never eats meat.
meanings.sent2: Being a veggie means choosing not to consume animal products.
meanings.sent3: Why did the veggie bring a ladder to the party? To reach the top shelf!
meanings.sent4: She stood out in the crowd like a lone veggie in a meat market.
meanings.sent5: The veggie at the table politely declined the steak dinner.
